content.en: Dialogue optimization: Researchers are exploring how algorithms can improve spoken dialogue systems by optimizing dialogue management and enhancing the learned strategies. They are using techniques such as reinforcement learning, ASR system modeling, and automatic user simulation tools to train statistical dialogue models and evaluate the best state space representations. Machine learning methods are also being evaluated for their practical benefit in commercial dialogue systems. These advancements aim to optimize dialogue behavior and improve the performance of spoken dialogue systems.
content.da: Dialogoptimering: Forskere udforsker, hvordan algoritmer kan forbedre talte dialogsystmer ved at optimere dialogstyring og forbedre de lærte strategier. De anvender teknikker såsom forstærkningslæring, ASR-systemmodellering og automatiske brugersimulatorværktøjer til at træne statistiske dialogmodeller og evaluere de bedste tilstandsrumrepræsentationer. Maskinlæringsmetoder bliver også vurderet for deres praktiske nytte i kommercielle dialogsystmer. Disse fremskridt sigter mod at optimere dialogadfærd og forbedre ydeevnen af talte dialogsystmer.
